message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exclusive product. I believe it has immense value and I'm confident you'll find it worth your while. With that said, I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.

I'm interested in the product, but I think $950000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $875000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I've seen in similar products. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $875000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think the product's value is worth a bit more. I'm willing to sell it to you for $925000. This is a compromise, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's unique features and benefits.

I understand that you're willing to meet me halfway, but I'm still not convinced that $925000 is the best price for me. I'm willing to go up to $900000, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that you're willing to go up to $900000, Bob, but I'm still not convinced that's the best price for the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I think the product's value is worth a bit more. I'm willing to sell it to you for $915000. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it seriously.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $915000 is the best price for me. I've already gone up to $900000, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm going to have to pass on this offer and explore other options. I'll consider buying the product from John for $800000 instead.
